description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Are you the Ultimate HaXor or just a LooZ3r? Outwit and out-maneuver your opponents to claim LEDs and become the top HaXor. Up to 4 people can play. Play against easy, hard, medium and expert AI. See how long you can survive...
description.short: Are you the Ultimate HaXor or just a LooZ3r? Outwit and out-maneuver your opponents to claim LEDs and become the top HaXor. Up to 4 people can play. Play against easy, hard, medium and expert AI. See how long you can survive...
